**保护斗篷**（cloak of protection）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它是一种由[布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")制成的[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")防具，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[ ]

## 生成

[阵营祭司](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B5%E8%90%A5%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "阵营祭司 (page does not exist)")、[高阶祭司](/index.php?title=%E9%AB%98%E9%98%B6%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "高阶祭司 (page does not exist)")和[大祭司](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%A7%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "大祭司 (page does not exist)")在生成时有2⁄21的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件保护斗篷[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

非[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")在生成时有约14.83%的概率获得一件保护斗篷[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。对于[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")玩家怪物，该斗篷有3⁄4的概率被替换成[长袍](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E8%A2%8D "长袍")，因此他们获得保护斗篷的概率仅有约3.71%[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")玩家怪物的斗篷则有1⁄2的概率被替换成[魔法抵抗斗篷](/wiki/%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E6%8A%B5%E6%8A%97%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "魔法抵抗斗篷")，因此他们获得保护斗篷的总概率约是7.42%[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。

## 描述

保护斗篷的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为3，且能提供[MC](/index.php?title=MC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "MC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")3。穿戴保护斗篷会[自动鉴定](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自动鉴定 (page does not exist)")之。

## 策略

保护斗篷是游戏中唯一一种能够提供MC3的单件防具，因此对于缺少强力[远程攻击](/index.php?title=%E8%BF%9C%E7%A8%8B%E6%94%BB%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "远程攻击 (page does not exist)")手段的玩家而言是非常实用的装备。可参见[销魔](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔 (page does not exist)")条目了解其能够防御的特殊攻击效果。

若玩家拥有其他来源的[魔法抵抗](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E6%8A%B5%E6%8A%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法抵抗 (page does not exist)")（例如通过[灰龙鳞甲](/wiki/%E7%81%B0%E9%BE%99%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2 "灰龙鳞甲")），也不需要[幻影斗篷](/wiki/%E5%B9%BB%E5%BD%B1%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "幻影斗篷")，可以考虑将保护斗篷加入其[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")。

### 鉴定

鉴定保护斗篷非常容易，只要做好[诅咒检测](/index.php?title=%E8%AF%85%E5%92%92%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "诅咒检测 (page does not exist)")，然后试穿即可。保护斗篷的基础价和[幻影斗篷](/wiki/%E5%B9%BB%E5%BD%B1%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "幻影斗篷")一样是50 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")。

## 历史

保护斗篷最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Cloak_of_protection/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a cloak of protection will produce either an [oilskin cloak](/wiki/Oilskin_cloak "Oilskin cloak") or [elven cloak](/wiki/Elven_cloak "Elven cloak"), while upgrading an oilskin cloak or elven cloak has a 1⁄4 chance of producing a cloak of protection.

### SporkHack

In [Sporkhack](/wiki/Sporkhack "Sporkhack"), [Wizards](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") start with a cloak of protection in place of the usual cloak of magic resistance.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the cloak of protection grants 3 AC and 3 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") while worn, and can be safely enchanted to +7. A [dragonhide](/wiki/Dragonhide "Dragonhide") cloak of protection can be very valuable, providing 9 AC and 10 DR at +7.

[Amm Kamerel](/wiki/Amm_Kamerel "Amm Kamerel") wizard leaders will always generate with a cloak of protection.

[The Mantle of Heaven](/wiki/The_Mantle_of_Heaven "The Mantle of Heaven") and [The Vestment of Hell](/wiki/The_Vestment_of_Hell "The Vestment of Hell") are [quest artifacts](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") for the [Noble](/wiki/Noble "Noble") that each have a cloak with a randomized appearance as their [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item"), making it possible for one of them to be a cloak of protection. The Mantle of Heaven appears as an ornamental cope and is given to [human](/wiki/Human_\(starting_race\) "Human (starting race)") and [incantifier](/wiki/Incantifier_\(starting_race\) "Incantifier (starting race)") Nobles, while The Vestment appears as an opera cloak and is given to [vampiric](/wiki/Vampire_\(starting_race_in_dNetHack\) "Vampire (starting race in dNetHack)") Nobles.

A cloak of protection can be used to repair the ballistic base layer of [imperial elven body armor](/wiki/Imperial_elven_armor "Imperial elven armor"), conferring [half physical damage](/wiki/Half_physical_damage "Half physical damage").

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), a cloak of protection can be created at a furnace by combining a [plain cloak](/wiki/Plain_cloak "Plain cloak") and an [amulet of guarding](/wiki/Amulet_of_guarding "Amulet of guarding").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), all non-[giant](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)") [Infidels](/wiki/Infidel "Infidel") start the game with a cursed fireproof +0 cloak of protection. The [gauntlets of protection](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_protection "Gauntlets of protection") are introduced as an alternate source of MC3 that giants and [tortles](/wiki/Tortle_\(starting_race\) "Tortle (starting race)") can use.

The [Archbishop of Moloch](/wiki/Archbishop_of_Moloch "Archbishop of Moloch") has a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a cloak of protection. Player monster [infidels](/index.php?title=Infidel_\(player_monster\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Infidel (player monster) (page does not exist)") that are not [giants](/wiki/Giant_\(monster_attribute\) "Giant (monster attribute)") are very likely to generate with a cloak of protection, and the cloak is also used in several kits for level 20 player monsters (minus giants and tortles).

### SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") introduces [Blackshroud](/index.php?title=Blackshroud\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Blackshroud (page does not exist)"), a neutral artifact cloak of protection that grants [warning](/wiki/Warning "Warning"), [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance") and acts as a [luckstone](/wiki/Luckstone "Luckstone") while worn. SlashTHEM also adds The Mantle of Heaven and The Vestment of Hell as Noble quest artifacts, which have a chance of their randomized appearance being a cloak of protection.

保护斗篷（cloak of protection）是NetHack中的一种斗篷类防具。它是一种由布制成的魔法防具，未鉴定时外观是随机的[1]。

生成

阵营祭司、高阶祭司和大祭司在生成时有2⁄21的概率获得一件保护斗篷[2]。

非僧侣职业的玩家怪物在生成时有约14.83%的概率获得一件保护斗篷[3][4]。对于牧师玩家怪物，该斗篷有3⁄4的概率被替换成长袍，因此他们获得保护斗篷的概率仅有约3.71%[5]。巫师玩家怪物的斗篷则有1⁄2的概率被替换成魔法抵抗斗篷，因此他们获得保护斗篷的总概率约是7.42%[6]。

描述

保护斗篷的基础AC加成为3，且能提供MC3。穿戴保护斗篷会自动鉴定之。

策略

保护斗篷是游戏中唯一一种能够提供MC3的单件防具，因此对于缺少强力远程攻击手段的玩家而言是非常实用的装备。可参见销魔条目了解其能够防御的特殊攻击效果。

若玩家拥有其他来源的魔法抵抗（例如通过灰龙鳞甲），也不需要幻影斗篷，可以考虑将保护斗篷加入其飞升套件。

鉴定

鉴定保护斗篷非常容易，只要做好诅咒检测，然后试穿即可。保护斗篷的基础价和幻影斗篷一样是50 zm。

历史

保护斗篷最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, upgrading a cloak of protection will produce either an oilskin cloak or elven cloak, while upgrading an oilskin cloak or elven cloak has a 1⁄4 chance of producing a cloak of protection.

SporkHack

In Sporkhack, Wizards start with a cloak of protection in place of the usual cloak of magic resistance.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, the cloak of protection grants 3 AC and 3 DR while worn, and can be safely enchanted to +7. A dragonhide cloak of protection can be very valuable, providing 9 AC and 10 DR at +7.

Amm Kamerel wizard leaders will always generate with a cloak of protection.

The Mantle of Heaven and The Vestment of Hell are quest artifacts for the Noble that each have a cloak with a randomized appearance as their base item, making it possible for one of them to be a cloak of protection. The Mantle of Heaven appears as an ornamental cope and is given to human and incantifier Nobles, while The Vestment appears as an opera cloak and is given to vampiric Nobles.

A cloak of protection can be used to repair the ballistic base layer of imperial elven body armor, conferring half physical damage.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, a cloak of protection can be created at a furnace by combining a plain cloak and an amulet of guarding.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, all non-giant Infidels start the game with a cursed fireproof +0 cloak of protection. The gauntlets of protection are introduced as an alternate source of MC3 that giants and tortles can use.

The Archbishop of Moloch has a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a cloak of protection. Player monster infidels that are not giants are very likely to generate with a cloak of protection, and the cloak is also used in several kits for level 20 player monsters (minus giants and tortles).

SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, SlashTHEM introduces Blackshroud, a neutral artifact cloak of protection that grants warning, drain resistance and acts as a luckstone while worn. SlashTHEM also adds The Mantle of Heaven and The Vestment of Hell as Noble quest artifacts, which have a chance of their randomized appearance being a cloak of protection.

|cost=50 |weight=10 |material=布 }} '''保护斗篷'''（cloak of protection）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[斗篷]]类[[防具]]。它是一种由[[布]]制成的[[魔法物品|魔法]]防具，未[[鉴定]]时外观是[[随机外观|随机]]的{{refsrc|src/objects.c|465|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 生成 == [[阵营祭司]]、[[高阶祭司]]和[[大祭司]]在生成时有{{frac|2|21}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一件保护斗篷{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|689|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 非[[僧侣（玩家怪物）|僧侣]]职业的[[玩家怪物]]在生成时有约14.83%的概率获得一件保护斗篷{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|157|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|207|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。对于[[牧师（玩家怪物）|牧师]]玩家怪物，该斗篷有{{frac|3|4}}的概率被替换成[[长袍]]，因此他们获得保护斗篷的概率仅有约3.71%{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|217|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[巫师（玩家怪物）|巫师]]玩家怪物的斗篷则有{{frac|2}}的概率被替换成[[魔法抵抗斗篷]]，因此他们获得保护斗篷的总概率约是7.42%{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|248|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 保护斗篷的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为3，且能提供{{cnlink|MC}}3。穿戴保护斗篷会[[自动鉴定]]之。 == 策略 == 保护斗篷是游戏中唯一一种能够提供MC3的单件防具，因此对于缺少强力[[远程攻击]]手段的玩家而言是非常实用的装备。可参见[[销魔]]条目了解其能够防御的特殊攻击效果。 若玩家拥有其他来源的[[魔法抵抗]]（例如通过[[灰龙鳞甲]]），也不需要[[幻影斗篷]]，可以考虑将保护斗篷加入其[[飞升套件]]。 === 鉴定 === 鉴定保护斗篷非常容易，只要做好[[诅咒检测]]，然后试穿即可。保护斗篷的基础价和[[幻影斗篷]]一样是50 [[金币|zm]]。 == 历史 == 保护斗篷最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], [[upgrading]] a cloak of protection will produce either an [[oilskin cloak]] or [[elven cloak]], while upgrading an oilskin cloak or elven cloak has a {{frac|4}} chance of producing a cloak of protection. ===SporkHack=== In [[Sporkhack]], [[Wizard]]s start with a cloak of protection in place of the usual cloak of magic resistance. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], the cloak of protection grants 3 AC and 3 [[DR]] while worn, and can be safely enchanted to +7. A [[dragonhide]] cloak of protection can be very valuable, providing 9 AC and 10 DR at +7. [[Amm Kamerel]] wizard leaders will always generate with a cloak of protection. [[The Mantle of Heaven]] and [[The Vestment of Hell]] are [[quest artifact]]s for the [[Noble]] that each have a cloak with a randomized appearance as their [[base item]], making it possible for one of them to be a cloak of protection. The Mantle of Heaven appears as an ornamental cope and is given to [[Human (starting race)|human]] and [[Incantifier (starting race)|incantifier]] Nobles, while The Vestment appears as an opera cloak and is given to [[Vampire (starting race in dNetHack)|vampiric]] Nobles. A cloak of protection can be used to repair the ballistic base layer of [[Imperial elven armor|imperial elven body armor]], conferring [[half physical damage]]. ===SpliceHack=== In [[SpliceHack]], a cloak of protection can be created at a furnace by combining a [[plain cloak]] and an [[amulet of guarding]]. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], all non-[[Giant (starting race)|giant]] [[Infidel]]s start the game with a cursed fireproof +0 cloak of protection. The [[gauntlets of protection]] are introduced as an alternate source of MC3 that giants and [[Tortle (starting race)|tortles]] can use. The [[Archbishop of Moloch]] has a {{frac|3}} chance of generating with a cloak of protection. Player monster [[Infidel (player monster)|infidels]] that are not [[Giant (monster attribute)|giants]] are very likely to generate with a cloak of protection, and the cloak is also used in several kits for level 20 player monsters (minus giants and tortles). ===SlashTHEM=== In addition to SLASH'EM details, [[SlashTHEM]] introduces [[Blackshroud]], a neutral artifact cloak of protection that grants [[warning]], [[drain resistance]] and acts as a [[luckstone]] while worn. SlashTHEM also adds The Mantle of Heaven and The Vestment of Hell as Noble quest artifacts, which have a chance of their randomized appearance being a cloak of protection. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Cloaks/zh-CN|BAOHUDOUPENG]]
